Articles.Content:
This was a very simple project. The idea being to get a small self-reliant capsule of my own design into orbit and back home safely. Introducing the Visigoth SC. I modelled it heavily after Soyuz and Apollo. It can carry extra cargo in heat-resistant boxes attached on the outside, which can be accessed through small air-tight panels on the inside. It is planned to dock with space stations to deliver important supplies.

Screenshots:

I\'m not providing a download on the account that this uses a SHITLOAD OF MODS!
If this is going to be in the Spacecraft Exchange, it needs a download. Provide links to all required mods.

If this is going to be in the Spacecraft Exchange, it needs a download. Provide links to all required mods.

I looked over the rules. I could not find anything about requiring downloads. Notify me if I missed something.

You do not have to share the .craft file of your ship if you do not wish to. In randy\'s case here, that is what he wants. That is fine, the author may do as he wishes.

Enjoy sharing your crafts!
Visigoth? lol? your gnu sack rome with that

Visigoth? lol? your gnu sack rome with that

As soon as I find a way to get it back in time, I\'m going to arm three Kerbals with the most modern of weaponry and land atop the emperor\'s palace in Rome. SUCK IT CAESAR. Come to think of it, who do you think would win? The emperor\'s guard or a squad of heavily armed Kerbals? Hmm....

As soon as I find a way to get it back in time, I\'m going to arm three Kerbals with the most modern of weaponry and land atop the emperor\'s palace in Rome. SUCK IT CAESAR. Come to think of it, who do you think would win? The emperor\'s guard or a squad of heavily armed Kerbals? Hmm....

That reminded me of Monty Python\'s Life Of Brian, where the Romans all go running away when they see the Judean People\'s Front arrive. The JPF leader yells \'Judean People\'s Front crack suicide squad, attack!' You can guess what that leads to.

Fairly certain the Kerbals are likely to do more damage to themselves than Caesar.

Also, very good orbiter.
